SummaryEnglish:
Set six years prior to the events of Barakamon, detailing the life of Seishuu Handa as a high school studentâ€”and a very interesting life it is.

In Handa-kun, Seishuu Handa is admired by his peers as a calligraphy genius and given the utmost respect, but Handa-kun himself is under the mistaken impression that the deference and attention he receives from the other students is actually bullying. Handa just wants to live a quiet life, but hilarity ensues as one character after another challenges his position as the school idol, and somehow comes away as a fan all while Handa is horrified and clueless.

1.SummaryEnglish: High-school student Handa Sei is well-liked and highly regarded -- except in his own mind.

2.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the Continuation of Episode 1 | Handa-kun and the Chairperson |  Handa-kun and the Model
2.SummaryEnglish: As likeable as Handa is, his negative outlook leads to mixed results in his encounters with various students.

3.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the Truant | Handa-kun and Cooking Class | Handa-kun and His Friend
3.SummaryEnglish: Handa's daily antics inspire even more students to embrace him as a treasured friend -- unfortunately, without him realizing it.

4.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and Handa-kun? | Handa-kun and a Girl's Jealousy | Handa-kun and Sociability
4.SummaryEnglish: Handa-kun has proven that he has an unusual charm attracting various people to him, including those he may not want to be associated with...

5.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the Student Council | Handa-kun and Memory Loss
5.SummaryEnglish: Despite his best efforts, Handa continues to get involved in the most bizarre situations. This time, his misadventures end up affecting his memory.

6.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and His Friend's Friend | Handa-kun and Dash Higashino | Handa-kun and Palmistry
6.SummaryEnglish: Kawafuji decides to introduce Handa to his friend, but as usual, Handa's knack for misinterpretation turns the entire situation on its head.

7.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the Supplementary Exam | Handa-kun and the Library
7.SummaryEnglish: Sadly, the Handa Force has two members who need to take the supplementary exam. What they don't realize is that Handa himself is in the same boat.

8.SummaryEnglish: The school trip becomes an unforgettable experience for Handa and the Handa Force when they encounter Ichimiya and his gang from Shiro High.

9.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the Frog | Handa-kun and the Stalker
9.SummaryEnglish: Handa's teacher plans to have his students dissect frogs, and Handa wants no part of it. But, as usual, Handa's feelings fail to come across.

10.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the Normal Guy | Handa-kun and the Bishoujo
10.SummaryEnglish: Kondo's time to shine finally arrives, while Handa gets caught in a conversation with a bishoujo figure.

11.TitleEnglish: Handa-kun and the School Festival Preperations
11.SummaryEnglish: Amidst preparations for the upcoming school cultural festival, Handa begins to gain a new perspective.

12.SummaryEnglish: High-school student Handa Sei is well-liked and highly regarded. As the school cultural festival comes to a close, Handa's world opens up before him.
